data.description:
VIVE Sync serves as a secure and flexible space where business professionals can discuss, collaborate, and share ideas seamlessly regardless of time and locations.  A custom avatar solution coupled with a full body avatar simulation, a virtual 3D environment, and many more features makes working remotely as effective as working in shared office.
Visit our website: https://sync.vive.com/ to book your meeting.

changelog.change_log:
•	One account, one storage location. VIVE Sync’s storage solution has been upgraded to a unified storage system so you can manage all your files from one place. 
o	You can only upload and download files from your local drive. You can no longer use Microsoft OneDrive to upload and download files. 
•	A new feature, Remote Desktop, has been added for AIO devices. This feature allows you to manage a local PC from your AIO headset and view your computer’s screen in your headset’s display.
•	You can now request control of a 3D model owned by someone else in the meeting room by asking to be a co-owner of the 3D model. Share your 3D models and collaborate with anyone!
•	The camera tool has been upgraded. Capture the moment in vivid 2K and 4K resolutions!

What’s new in VIVE Sync
•	VIVE Sync now supports VIVE Avatar’s new cartoon-style avatars. Go to https://viverse.com/avatar and create one now!

•	You can now play and share 360° videos in VIVE Sync. Time to break into another dimension!
•	Safe zone is now available for beta testing. Safe zone lets you keep your distance from other avatars in VIVE Sync so you don’t have to worry about anyone invading your personal space.
•	VIVE Sync now supports VRM avatars, allowing you to express yourself more freely with a more personalized avatar Go to https://viverse.com/avatar and upload yours today!

VIVE Avatar Creator - The new avatar creator app, VIVE Avatar Creator, is now available for download. The previous app, VIVE Sync Avatar Creator will be discontinued.  
•	Android: VIVE Avatar Creator is available on the Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.htc.viveavatar 
•	iOS: After updating VIVE Sync Avatar Creator, it will be replaced with VIVE Avatar Creator. 
Features: 
•	Use a selfie to generate your avatar’s face.  
•	Choose from more than 125 outfit options for your avatar.  
•	Connect your HTC account and use your avatar in VIVERSE. 

What’s new in VIVE Sync 
•	Screen mirroring can now be enabled from any window. The mirrored screen will appear directly in front of you. 
•	Presentation view now supports PPTs and PDFs.  
•	Presenter notes for PPTs can now be viewed via presentation view. 
•	Sticky Notes can now be edited. 
•	The Keyboard has been improved to increase usability. 
•	Your profile picture and display name are now visible from the Sync Menu.

VIVE Sync v2.13 release notes

•	Added support for Simplified Chinese keyboard
•	Added support for editing Personal Space playlist
•	Added support for Private talk in Viewer mode
•	Added avatar speech animations in Viewer mode
•	A new app, the VIVE Sync File Manager, is now available. This app can be used to upload PowerPoint files to meeting rooms.

Thanks for downloading VIVE Sync – if you’re a new user, welcome to The Future of Meetings! If you’re a returning user, we hope you like our brand new look and a plethora of new features: 

Updated VIVE Wave SDK to 4.2 

Added “City view" room 

Added support for host code input 

Added support for multiple Keyboard lines 

Fixed some bugs 

Enhanced performance 

Feedback appreciated! If you encounter any issues or have suggestions to make Sync better, share them with us: sync_support@htc.com. 
Enjoy all features during the exclusive free trial period. Purchase an enterprise level subscription to VIVE Sync for unlimited, uninterrupted service.
